info.name: Fulfillment Order Management API
info.description: API for managing the lifecycle of fulfillment orders.

body.raw:
{
  "seller_fulfillment_order_id": "seller-abc-123",
  "displayable_order_id": "cust-po-456",
  "displayable_order_date": "2025-09-05T10:00:00Z",
  "displayable_order_comment": "Thank you for your order!",
  "shipping_speed_category": "STANDARD",
  "destination_address": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "address_line_1": "123 Main Street",
    "address_line_2": "Apt 4B",
    "city": "New York",
    "state_or_region": "NY",
    "postal_code": "10001",
    "country_code": "US"
  },
  "items": [
    {
      "seller_sku": "item-xyz-789",
      "seller_fulfillment_order_item_id": "line-item-1",
      "quantity": 2,
      "gift_message": "Happy Birthday!",
      "displayable_comment": "Special item"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Submits a new fulfillment order to the system. To ensure idempotency, the client-provided `seller_fulfillment_order_id` is used. If an order with the same ID already exists, a 409 Conflict will be returned.

response.name: Bad Request
response.body: Bad Request. The request body is invalid or missing required fields.

response.name: Conflict
response.body: Conflict. A fulfillment order with the provided `seller_fulfillment_order_id` already exists.

request.description: Retrieves the current state and details of a specific fulfillment order using its system-generated unique ID.

request.description: Requests the cancellation of a fulfillment order. Cancellation is only possible if the order has not yet been shipped.

response.name: Accepted
response.body: Accepted. The cancellation request has been accepted and is being processed.

response.name: Bad Request
response.body: Bad Request. The order is not in a state that allows cancellation (e.g., already shipped).

response.name: Not Found
response.body: Not Found. No fulfillment order found with the given ID.

variable.description: The unique system-generated identifier for the fulfillment order
